languages.text: Успокоить бойца — должно быть, его напугали странные образы, и он упустил товарищей из виду.

traits.locale_text: Успокоить бойца — должно быть, его напугали странные образы, и он упустил товарищей из виду.

languages.text: Calm the soldier down. He was probably scared by the strange visions and lost sight of his comrades.
languages.original_text: Успокоить бойца — должно быть, его напугали странные образы, и он упустил товарищей из виду.

traits.locale_text: Calm the soldier down. He was probably scared by the strange visions and lost sight of his comrades.

Calm the soldier down. He was probably scared by the strange visions and lost sight of his comrades.

languages.text: 让那个士兵冷静下来。他很可能是被奇怪的景象吓坏了，没有看见他的战友。
languages.original_text: Calm the soldier down. He was probably scared by the strange visions and lost sight of his comrades.

traits.locale_text: 让那个士兵冷静下来。他很可能是被奇怪的景象吓坏了，没有看见他的战友。

languages.text: 兵士を落ち着かせる。おそらく彼は奇妙な幻影に怯え、仲間を見失ったのだろう。
languages.original_text: Calm the soldier down. He was probably scared by the strange visions and lost sight of his comrades.

traits.locale_text: 兵士を落ち着かせる。おそらく彼は奇妙な幻影に怯え、仲間を見失ったのだろう。

languages.text: Calmar al soldado. Probablemente se asustó por las extrañas visiones y perdió de vista a sus camaradas.
languages.original_text: Calm the soldier down. He was probably scared by the strange visions and lost sight of his comrades.

traits.locale_text: Calmar al soldado. Probablemente se asustó por las extrañas visiones y perdió de vista a sus camaradas.

languages.text: Den Soldaten beruhigen. Er hatte vermutlich Angst vor den merkwürdigen Visionen und hat seine Kameraden aus den Augen verloren.
languages.original_text: Calm the soldier down. He was probably scared by the strange visions and lost sight of his comrades.

traits.locale_text: Den Soldaten beruhigen. Er hatte vermutlich Angst vor den merkwürdigen Visionen und hat seine Kameraden aus den Augen verloren.

languages.text: Calmer le soldat. Il a sans doute été effrayé par les étranges visions et perdu ses camarades de vue.
languages.original_text: Calm the soldier down. He was probably scared by the strange visions and lost sight of his comrades.

traits.locale_text: Calmer le soldat. Il a sans doute été effrayé par les étranges visions et perdu ses camarades de vue.
